Text: I'm thankful to the uploader for this torrent but unfortunately, everytime I go to use this app, it is asking for the serial #. It just won't save or accept. I can't work it out?

instal Click StuffIt Deluxe 2011_15.0.2.dmg


Once Mounted A New Window Will Open, Double Click Installer.mpkg to Start The Installaion

Follow The Onscreen Instrucions By The Installer

When The Program Ask You To Enter A Serial Number To Continue With Installation

Use one Of The Serials Provided Below And Click  Continue , When Ask To Register

Untick The CheckBox And Click Continue, Then Click Install , 

When Finish Installing, Click Close To Exit.

Done Enjoy 

Make sure app don't call home .
